summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 21st Avenue Southwest, from West Barton Street to West Henderson Street; by constructing sewers, and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with property owners' petition, being City Comptroller File No. 180432, to the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
